name: Ocean Voidyage
description:
Ocean Voidyage is a point and click adventure game. Scratch your head and figure out the mystery of the SAND and use your skills to endure the horrible puns of this terrible world of the void!

Ocean Voidyage is a game jam game from the 'Butterscotch ShenaniJam 2018'

Theme: Void sand-wich

  • Gameboy - Your game only uses 8-bit soundfx and is in the classic gameboy 4-color green palette.
  • Mozart - compose your own music.
  • Maverick - Your team size is 1.

Credits: Used to make this game

  • https://www.bfxr.net/ for gameboy sfx
  • http://www.pulseboy.com/ for music
  • Unreal Engine 4.19
